page.title: 11Industry Within Inverbervie
page.content: One of the few industries in our D block is at the{Highlands Seafoods} {Factory}situated very near the mouth of the Bervie Water. Last year it looked as if this factory would close but recently it was bought over and the workforce has jumped back up to seventy women and ten men with prospects of more employees being taken on. The sea foods dealt with are{crabs} caught locally,{prawns}caught on the West Coast,{salmon}brought over from fish farms also on the West Coast. The live shellfish are cooked, opened up and meat taken out, frozen and packed, while the salmon is smoked, sliced and packed ready for export. While some of the finished products are sold in this country some are exported to Italy, America and Belgium.
